title: Retrieval-Reasoning Large Language Model-based Synthetic Clinical Trial Generation
details: Z Xu, F Wu, T Fu, Y Zhao - arXiv preprint arXiv:2410.12476, 2024
abstract: Machine learning (ML) exhibits promise in the clinical domain. However, it is constrained by data scarcity and ethical considerations, as the generation of clinical trials presents significant challenges due to stringent privacy regulations, high costs …
